Package comp3111.popnames

Class Task3

java.lang.Object
comp3111.popnames.Task3
public class Task3
extends java.lang.Object
This class deals mainly with Task 3 and contains only static functions to validate data and execute the main query. There are are three functions that are used for validating inputs.

  • Method Details

    • Trend

      public static java.lang.String Trend​(int high_year, int low_year)
      Determines trend given two years.
      Parameters:
      high_year - the year when the rank was the highest.
      low_year - the year when the rank was the lowest.
      Returns:
      String value of trend by comparing high_year and low_year.

    • checkYear

      public static boolean checkYear​(int year)
      Input validation function.
      Parameters:
      year - the starting year of the period.
      Returns:
      the boolean if the period is correct and within the range.

    • checkYearPair

      public static boolean checkYearPair​(int start, int end)
      Input validation function.
      Parameters:
      start - the starting year of the period.
      end - the ending year of the period.
      Returns:
      the boolean if the period is correct and within the range.

    • validateTopN

      public static boolean validateTopN​(int TopN)
      Input validation function.
      Parameters:
      TopN - the top N ranks to check.
      Returns:
      the boolean whether topN is greater than or equal to 1.

    • TopNames

      public static java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String>> TopNames​(int start_year, int end_year, java.lang.String gender, int TopN)
      Main algorithm of task 3.
      Parameters:
      start_year - the starting year in the period.
      end_year - the ending year of the period.
      gender - the gender of the person querying.
      TopN - the top N ranks to be checked.
      Returns:
      the Arraylist containing records queried

    • execute3Query

      public static java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String>> execute3Query​(int start_year, int end_year, java.lang.String gender, int TopN)
      Main query function of task 3. Validate and parses inputs to the algorithm. Saves logs.
      Parameters:
      start_year - the starting year in the period.
      end_year - the ending year of the period.
      gender - the gender of the person querying.
      TopN - the top N ranks to be checked.
      Returns:
      the Arraylist containing records queried
